info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 1 at 8:41PM EDT until October 2 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding.
* WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County.
* WHEN...Until 1 PM EDT Thursday, especially around the time of high tide.
* IMPACTS...At 3.5 feet, water covers roads on Saint George Island, is in yards, and is approaching structures. To the east, inundation is occurring at multiple marinas off St. Mary's River, Smith Creek, and Jutland Creek.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. The next high tides at Piney Point are 10:23 PM and 11:10 AM. The next high tides at Point Lookout are 9:34 PM and 9:53 AM. The next high tides at Coltons Point are 10:59 PM and 11:46 AM.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

parameter.value: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EDT THURSDAY
